|  [retryUntil?](./pentf.retryoptions.retryuntil.md) | () =&gt; Promise&lt;boolean&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional check to verify that the operation was successful. This is needed in cases where a DOM node is present and we clicked on it, but the framework that rendered the node didn't set up any event listeners yet. |
